subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] re: hz
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
General range 200 Hz - 15 kHz. Women at the higher part of the range and 
men at the lower part generally.

Zack

On Sat, 5 Jul 2008, Pridegrl Neverumind wrote:

>
> question-
> what hz is the human voice??
> i understand that the hz for spirit voices is much much lower than the human range. anyone know exactly what those numbers are? and is there software to determine this?
> thanks
> Charm
>
